projects.name: Twitch Bot
projects.description: A real-time Twitch chat bot that lets users trade stocks via chat commands. Integrates with Robinhood API, supports buying/selling, and provides live feedback. Secure, multi-threaded, and interactive.

projects.name: Basic Chat Protocol
projects.description: A real-time chat program using Python socket programming. Supports multi-client communication, a client-server model, and a simple CLI. Implements half-duplex messaging over TCP connections.

projects.name: Firewall Flooding Simulation
projects.description: A network security simulation using flooding techniques to test firewall performance. Supports packet filtering, access control, traffic monitoring, and topology configuration via a CLI.

projects.name: Web Crawler
projects.description: A standalone program that recursively crawls internal web pages from a seed URL, storing content up to a specified depth. Includes error handling and efficient page management.

projects.name: alphaWild
projects.description: Early alpha of Wildin Foos, a procedurally generated survival game. Features terrain generation and player controllers. Future updates include bosses, crafting, multiplayer, and base building.
